name: Watchdog
description:
Infiltrate the museum to steal the diamond! Security cameras and locked doors lie in your way, but you can disable them with a click of a button. Be careful, though - you'll have to keep the devices alive to avoid suspicion!

Music: Der Zirkus Brennt - Spy from the Void (licensed under CC-BY-NC-SA)

Hotfix 1.1: Fixed some elements not appearing at resolutions other than 16:9
